dict.acceptation: [生]机制，机能，[乐]机理；（机械）结构，机械装置[作用]，（故事的）结构；[艺]手法，技巧，途径；机械作用；

sent.orig: These mechanisms include to teach mechanism, influence mechanism, motivation mechanism and safeguard mechanism to wait.
sent.trans: 这些机制包括教育机制、权力机制、动力机制和保障机制等。

sent.orig: The venture capital funds raising mechanism, governance mechanism and retreat mechanism have strong related effect.
sent.trans: 风险资本筹集机制、治理机制和退出机制之间存在关联效应。

sent.orig: Economy of market mechanism since runs a mechanism, the formation that is labor income mechanism.
sent.trans: 市场机制既是经济运行机制，又是劳动收入的形成机制。

sent.orig: The mechanical system consists of moving mechanism, clamping force amplifier, rotating manipulator mechanism.
sent.trans: 机械系统由移动机构、夹紧力放大器、旋转式机械手机构构成。

sent.orig: The structure and traits of direction moving mechanism and direction moving mechanism with rotation were introduced.
sent.trans: 详细叙述了双向移动和单向移动加转向步履机构的结构和特点。
